title: Hextech Kog'Maw Splash
body: I think it's pretty neat.  Look at the cute little kids staring at him XD

replies.body:
Hextech Kog: "Hey kid, come closer. I've got some really good shit for you, come and have a good look at it?"

Kid: "Dad/mum~ that thing is creeping me out."

Dad/mum: "Let's just ignore it and go back to the car. Come on, kiddo, let's go."
its like hes they new toy/pet on the market and everyone want to buy the brand new kow'maw 9000
I have 7/10 gemstones was hoping to get PAX Sivir but that seems really unlikely so I guess I'll just save up for this one. Definitely an adorable splash art.

Man this splash really reminds me of magic the gathering.

Anyway I think it looks really good
dad is gonna key the hell out of that kogmaw
